sentences.en: Boil the liquid in a small saucepan to reduce it by half.
sentences.cn: 用小炖锅炖，收一半汤汁。

sentences.en: Boil the water in the saucepan and add the sage.
sentences.cn: 把平底锅里的水烧开，然后加入鼠尾草。

sentences.en: Fill a saucepan with water and bring to a slow boil.
sentences.cn: 往平底锅里加满水，小火煮沸。

sentences.en: He poured the coffee out of the saucepan into the jug.
sentences.cn: 他把咖啡从深平底锅倒入壶中.

sentences.en: Heat a couple of tablespoons of olive oil, a chopped clove of garlic and some black pepper in a heavy saucepan.
sentences.cn: 将几勺橄榄油、一片切碎的蒜瓣和一些黑胡椒粉放入深平底锅里加热。

sentences.en: Heat one tablespoon of oil in a saucepan.
sentences.cn: 将一汤匙油倒在锅中烧热.

sentences.en: Heat the oil and garlic in a large saucepan.
sentences.cn: 在大平底锅里把油和大蒜加热。

sentences.en: Just a bit of a mouse's dropping will spoil a whole saucepan of broth.
sentences.cn: 一粒老鼠屎败坏一锅汤.

sentences.en: Mother dished the food up straight out of the saucepan.
sentences.cn: 母亲直接从平底锅里盛出饭菜端上来.

sentences.en: Place the saucepan over moderate heat until the cider is very hot but not boiling.
sentences.cn: 把炖锅置于中火上加热，直到苹果酒变得很烫，但不要加热到沸腾。

sentences.en: Put water, butter and lard into a saucepan and bring slowly to the boil.
sentences.cn: 把水、黄油和猪油倒入平底锅，然后慢火煮沸。

sentences.en: She scoured the saucepan with cleanser.
Soften the butter mixture in a small saucepan.
sentences.cn: 在小平底锅里将黄油混合物化软。

sentences.en: Thaw it out completely before reheating in a saucepan.
sentences.cn: 先把它完全化开，然后再放在平底锅里重新加热。

sentences.en: The milk was warming in a saucepan on the stove.
sentences.cn: 牛奶放在炉灶上的锅里热着.

sentences.en: Transfer this sauce to a separate saucepan, if desired.
sentences.cn: 如果愿意的话，可以把这些调味汁倒入一只单独的长柄锅里。

trans.tran_cn: 长柄而有盖子的深平底锅，炖锅
trans.tran_en: a deep round metal container with a handle that is used for cooking
